Bash(--body "## ðŸ“Š Stage 2 Implementation Status

**Current Status**: Stage 2 foundation complete, need to execute full training and evaluation

### âœ… **Completed Components**
- âœ… EfficientNetV2-B3 training script with 1-epoch validation (AUC: 0.9775)
- âœ… GenConViT dual-mode system architecture implementation
- âœ… GenConViT manager with hybrid/pretrained mode switching
- âœ… Comprehensive testing framework

### ðŸ”„ **Remaining Tasks**

#### **Task 2.1: EfficientNetV2-B3 Full Training**
- **Action**: Execute 50-epoch training with optimal hyperparameters
- **Expected Time**: 4-5 hours
- **Target**: AUC >0.90, F1 >0.85
- **Status**: Ready to execute

#### **Task 2.2: GenConViT Training Execution**
- **Action**: Train both ED and VAE variants using dual-mode system
- **Expected Time**: 6-8 hours
- **Target**: AUC >0.93 (based on paper: 99.3% AUC)
- **Status**: Architecture ready, need training execution

#### **Task 2.3: Feature Extraction Pipeline**
- **Action**: Implement \`feature_extractor.py\` for both models
- **Expected Time**: 2-3 hours
- **Purpose**: Prepare embeddings for Stage 3 meta-model

#### **Task 2.4: Stage 2 Evaluation & Calibration**
- **Action**: Comprehensive evaluation and calibration of both models
- **Expected Time**: 2 hours
- **Deliverables**: Performance reports, calibrated models

### ðŸŽ¯ **Success Criteria**
- **EfficientNetV2-B3**: AUC >0.90, F1 >0.85
- **GenConViT**: AUC >0.93, F1 >0.88
- **Complementarity**: Different failure modes between CNN and generative approaches
- **Integration Ready**: Seamless Stage 1 â†’ Stage 2 pipeline

### ðŸš€ **Technical Specifications**
- **Data**: 625,879 training + 148,238 validation samples
- **Format**: Unified 256x256 PNG format
- **GPU**: CUDA acceleration with optimized batch sizes
- **Output**: \`output/stage2/\` with trained models and evaluation reports

### ðŸ“‹ **Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] EfficientNetV2-B3 fully trained with >0.90 AUC
- [ ] GenConViT dual-mode system trained and validated
- [ ] Feature extraction pipeline implemented and tested
- [ ] Comprehensive evaluation reports generated
- [ ] Models calibrated and ready for Stage 3 integration
- [ ] Documentation updated with Stage 2 results

This issue represents the completion of the precision analyzer component of our cascade system." )
